# Playlist property keys

**API Collection**

Keys that contain information about a playlist.

## Overview

Use these keys with the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaEntity/canFilter(byProperty:)] and [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaEntity/value(forProperty:)] methods to obtain information about a playlist. You can use properties described as “filterable” to build media property predicates (see [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPropertyPredicate]).

## Property keys

- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyAuthorDisplayName**: App defined name for the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyName**: The name of the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyDescriptionText**: Descriptive text for the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyPersistentID**: The persistent identifier for the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyPlaylistAttributes**: The attributes associated with the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertyCloudGlobalID**: The cloud identifier for the playlist.
- **MPMediaPlaylistPropertySeedItems**: The items seeded to generate the playlist; applies only to Genius playlists.
